abstract: Pan American Health Organization, representing a global health panel, announces Rubella, also known as German measles, has been eliminated from the Americas after 15-year battle; Americas region is first to eradicate disease, with European region, including Eastern Europe, Russia and Central Asia, hoping to follow next.
lead_paragraph: The disease, also known as German measles, is no longer a threat in the region, a scientific panel set up by global health authorities announced on Wednesday.

headline.main: Rubella Has Been Eliminated From the Americas, Health Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Rubella Has Been Eliminated From the Americas, Health Officials Say

snippet: The disease, also known as German measles, is no longer a threat in the region, a scientific panel set up by global health authorities announced on Wednesday.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
